news.name: Scholar discusses refugee research
news.description: Mitra Naseh, who directs the Forced Migration Initiative at the Brown School, takes part in a podcast episode recapping the International Association for the Study of Forced Migration conference in Indonesia. She and doctoral student Jihye Lee discussed their research on resettled refugees in the U.S.

news.name: Two from Brown School named fellows by WashUâ€™s Center for Race, Ethnicity & Equity
news.description: Jihye Lee, a PhD student in social work, has been selected as a 2025-2026 Race & Ethnicity Scholar Fellow. This fellowship is awarded annually to three graduate students whose work advances scholarship in race, ethnicity, and equity. Fellows participate in events, workshops, and professional development opportunities, and are encouraged to share their research or creative work with their cohort and center affiliates.

news.name: Keynote Speaker at International Social Work Conference
news.description: Delivered keynote address on 'Digital Inclusion and Mental Health in Immigrant Communities' at the 2023 International Conference on Social Work in Chicago.

news.name: New Course: Data Science for Social Work
news.description: Launching a new graduate course combining data science methodologies with social work practice for the Spring 2024 semester. Registration is now open.

news.name: Research Collaboration with Brown School Health Initiative
news.description: Beginning a new collaborative project examining the impact of social media on mental health outcomes in Asian American youth. The study will involve 500 participants.

news.name: Workshop on Cultural Competency in Digital Health
news.description: Leading a professional development workshop for healthcare providers on implementing culturally responsive digital health interventions.

news.name: New Book Chapter on Immigration Policy and Health
news.description: Contributed a chapter to the upcoming book 'Global Perspectives on Immigration and Health' examining policy frameworks across different countries.

news.name: Excellence in Teaching Award 2023
news.description: Honored with the Excellence in Teaching Award from Brown School for innovative pedagogical approaches in social work education.

news.name: Featured on Social Work Research Podcast
news.description: Discussed research findings on immigrant health disparities and digital intervention strategies on the 'Future of Social Work' podcast series.

news.name: Policy Brief: Improving Access to Mental Health Services
news.description: Published policy recommendations for state and federal agencies on enhancing mental health service accessibility for immigrant communities.
